headline.main: Rediagnosis Of History's Great Men; 'Somato-historians' shed new light on some famous patients of old. Great Men

docs.abstract: L W Robinson discusses contemporary drs' rediagnosis of signs and symptoms of disease in many historical leaders in light of current med knowledge; illus
docs.lead_paragraph: IN the past fifty years the progress of medicine has been fantastic. The knowledge acquired in these five decades far outweighs the accumulated knowledge of the five thousand years that went before.
docs.snippet: IN the past fifty years the progress of medicine has been fantastic. The knowledge acquired in these five decades far outweighs the accumulated knowledge of the five thousand years that went before.

headline.main: PUBLIC IS ADVISED TO CUT WAISTLINE; Metropolitan Life Cautions Those 25 and Over to Keep Slim and Live Longer

docs.abstract: Met Life Ins Co urges those over 25 to lose weight; pub table of desirable weights; notes range is about 20 lbs below Actuaries Soc table pub in Oct; table
docs.lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Life Insurance Company urged the public yesterday to watch its waistline in the interest of longer life and better health. It directed its advice especially to men in their twenties and thirties.
docs.snippet: The Metropolitan Life Insurance Company urged the public yesterday to watch its waistline in the interest of longer life and better health. It directed its advice especially to men in their twenties and thirties.
